items.name: Iron Ingot
items.description: An ingot full of potential. Can be used to craft iron armor, weapons, and tools.

items.name: Gold Ingot
items.description: An ingot full of potential. Can be used to craft gold armor, weapons, and tools.

items.name: Diamond
items.description: A shiny gem. Can be used to craft powerful diamond armor, weapons, and tools.

items.name: Iron Pickaxe
items.description: A basic but durable pickaxe. Breaks rocks!

items.name: Gold Pickaxe
items.description: A fast but flimsy pickaxe. Breaks rocks!

items.name: Diamond Pickaxe
items.description: A very fast and durable pickaxe. Breaks rocks!

items.name: Iron Shovel
items.description: A basic but durable shovel. Breaks dirt/gravel/sand!

items.name: Gold Shovel
items.description: A fast but flimsy shovel. Breaks dirt/gravel/sand!

items.name: Diamond Shovel
items.description: A very fast and durable shovel. Breaks dirt/gravel/sand!

items.name: Iron Axe
items.description: A basic but durable axe. Chops wood!

items.name: Gold Axe
items.description: A fast but flimsy axe. Chops wood!

items.name: Diamond Axe
items.description: A very fast and durable axe. Chops wood!
